channel.title: Help. Plawkz [508]
channel.description:
ok so its palidino76's base, with a few things added. i dont really understand 508's as much as i understand 317's.
1) I dont understand how i add Owner/hidden admin/admin/mod. 2) How do i make the server playable on a client and.. 3) How do i portforward 508's with uTorrent i) is it just the same as portforwarding 317s?
O_o Thanks if you help Halton <3 :)
